content_list: The regulations must, subject to any exceptions provided for in the regulations, require the landlord to provide the tenant with a report by a qualified person on information which the landlord is required to provide by virtue of this section.

A secure tenant claims to exercise the right to buy by written notice to that effect served on the landlord.
